# Table of Contents

This document provides an overview of all documentation files in this directory.

## Documentation

- [README.md](README.md): Main documentation for GitHub templates and conventions.
- [overview.md](overview.md): Global articulation between templates and PR generation.
- [pr_template.md](pr_template.md): PR template purpose, sections, and conventions.
- [issue_template_direct_issue.md](issue_template_direct_issue.md): Direct issue template purpose and usage.
- [issue_template_review_followup.md](issue_template_review_followup.md): Review follow-up issue template purpose and usage.
- [issue_template_config.md](issue_template_config.md): Issue template chooser configuration reference.

## Templates

- [Pull Request Template](../../PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/default.md): Default pull request template.
- [Issue Template - Direct Issue](../../ISSUE_TEMPLATE/direct_issue.md): Template for direct, non-review issues.
- [Issue Template - Review Follow-up](../../ISSUE_TEMPLATE/review_followup.md): Template for issues created from review comments.
- [Issue Template Config](../../ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml): Issue template chooser configuration.
